column5:
Graduate studies in architectural engineering are offered through the Department of Civil, Environmental and Architectural Engineering. The department offers a Master of Science degree with study emphases in several major areas:
             


               building systems engineering
              

               construction engineering and management
              

               global engineering
              


              For more information, visit the department's
              
               Graduate Studies
              
              webpage.
             

              Requirements
             

              For a Master of Science (MS) degree in architectural engineering, students may undertake Plan I (with a thesis) or Plan II (with a project).
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
